alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:33PM CDT until April 16 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Unprotected farmland begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and then crest near 18.4 feet Friday. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Kaskaskia River Vandalia 18.0 17.3 Thu 8 pm 17.5 14.8 14.1 13.6 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
